Package io.github.the_pocket

Class PocketFlow.BaseNode<P,​E,​R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.the_pocket.PocketFlow.BaseNode<P,​E,​R>
  • Type Parameters:
    P - Type of the result from the prep phase.
    E - Type of the result from the exec phase.
    R - Type of the final result/action returned by the node's run cycle (often String).
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PocketFlow.Flow, PocketFlow.Node
    Enclosing class:
    PocketFlow
    public abstract static class PocketFlow.BaseNode<P,​E,​R>
extends Object
    Base class for all nodes in the workflow.
